frame.name: Containment_relation
frame.definition: <def-root>An Entity is described as located inside a Container. <ex><fex name="Fig">Tom</fex> <m>is</m> <t>in</t> <fex name="Grnd">the kitchen</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Ground
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ground</fen> serves as a basis for describing the location of the <fen>Figure</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Figure
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Figure</fen> is perceived as located inside a certain <fen>Ground</fen> location. </def-root>

FE.name: Direction
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Direction</fen> from a reference location (generally, the deictic center) of a path to the <fen>Figure</fen>. <ex>The book is way <fex name="Dir">back</fex> <t>in</t> the Paleontology area.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The period of time during which the locative relation between <fen>Figure</fen> and <fen>Ground</fen> obtains.
<ex>He was <t>in</t> Athens <fex name="tim">on Friday</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: in.prep
lexUnit.definition: COD: expressing the situation of being enclosed or surrounded by something.
